state_analysis: The test script has been created but contains syntax errors due to improperly formatted escape characters. This results in a SyntaxError when attempting to run the script.
explanation: We need to ensure proper formatting of the test script without including unnecessary escape characters. I will create the script again, ensuring that it is correctly formatted. After that, I will attempt to run it to verify the functionality of the solve function.

commands.keystrokes:
echo "import numpy as np
from grid_transform import solve

test_input = [[8, 6], [6, 4]]
expected_output = [[8, 6, 8, 6, 8, 6], [6, 4, 6, 4, 6, 4], [6, 8, 6, 8, 6, 8], [4, 6, 4, 6, 4, 6], [8, 6, 8, 6, 8, 6], [6, 4, 6, 4, 6, 4]]
result = solve(test_input)
assert result == expected_output, f'Expected {expected_output}, but got {result}'
print('Test passed!')" > test_script.py
